original_text: And when they were at Salamis, they preached the word of God in the synagogues of the Jews: and they had also John to their minister.
korean_text: 살라미에 이르러 하나님의 말씀을 유대인의 여러 회당에서 전할새 요한을 수행원으로 두었더라

sentences.original_text: And when they were at Salamis
they preached the word of God
in the synagogues of the Jews
and they had also John to their minister
